person.persName: Andrew J. Banta (Nicholas County, Kentucky, farmer and sheriff)

body.p: Nicholas County, Kentucky, farmer and sheriff. Married to Elizabeth Banta. Father of Judy L. Banta, John P. Banta, Margaret Banta, Peter M. Banta, and Naoma Banta. Farmer in Nicholas County in 1860. Owned eight enslaved persons in 1860. Sheriff of Nicholas County in 1861. Private in the 1st Battalion, Kentucky Mounted Rifles (Confederate) from October 1861 to November 1862. Private in the 1st Kentucky Cavalry (Confederate) in June 1864. Private in the 9th Kentucky Cavalry Regiment (Confederate) in June 1865.
